wikitext.*:
[[File:War Office 2 January 1917.jpg|thumb]] On [[2 January]] [[1917]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to the [[Wikipedia:War Office|War Office]]'''.{{CG|C}}, p. 98 *'''Subject:''' Tolkien declares himself fit to report for duty. ==Transcription== {{blockquote|Sir,
I have the honour to report myself for further orders.
My address on Jan 12th. 1917. will be at
185 Monument Road
Edgbaston
Birmingham

I have the honour to be,
Sir,
Your obedient servant.

JRR Tolkien}} ==See also== *[[War Office form 22 November 1916]] ==External links== *"[https://web.archive.org/web/20230922043856/https://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk/pathways/firstworldwar/people/p_tolkien_med.htm J R R Tolkien: trench fever]" at [http://www.nationalarchives.gov.uk NationalArchives.co.uk] {{References}} [[Category:Letters|War Office]]
